content: *this simple is worked seamlessly in the round it starts with 2x2 rib then is worked in simple checkered pattern of knit and purl stitches * **size** one size to fit 58-60 cm / 23-24 head circumference length from brim to top - about 22 cm / 9 **yarn** 1 skein of big merino hug by rosy green wool 100% merino 160 m / 175y per 100 g shown in colorway 56 coffee bean or any other aran weight yarn **needles** 5 0 mm / us #8 circular needle 40 cm/16 long and/or dpns or preferred needles for decreasing circumference or appropriate size to get gauge 4 5 mm / us #7 circular needle 40 cm/16 long or dpns or one size smaller than gauge needles **other** 1 stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving **gauge** 16 sts and 24 rnds in 10 cm / 4 in st st worked in the round with needle 5 0 mm / us #8 after washing take time to save time and check your gauge adjust needle size if necessary
